welcome.title: Open your new bank account
welcome.description_p_1: To open a bank account, we will need to verify your identity.
welcome.description_p_2: It will only take a couple of minutes.

identity.title: Verify your identity
identity.hint: Select the type of document you would like to upload

proof_of_address.title: Select a UK document
proof_of_address.hint: These are the documents most likely to show your current home address
proof_of_address.utility_bill_hint: Gas, electricity, water, landline, or broadband
proof_of_address.benefits_letter_hint: Government authorised household benefits eg. Jobseeker allowance, Housing benefit

front.title: Front of license
front.instructions: Upload front of license from your computer
front.webcam: Position the front of license in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

back.title: Back of license
back.instructions: Upload back of license from your computer
back.webcam: Position the back of license in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

front.title: Front of card
front.instructions: Upload front of card from your computer
front.webcam: Position the front of card in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

back.title: Back of card
back.instructions: Upload back of card from your computer
back.webcam: Position the back of card in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

front.title: Passport photo page
front.instructions: Upload passport photo page from your computer
front.webcam: Position your passport photo page in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

front.title: Bank Statement
front.sub_title: Must be issued in the last 3 months
front.instructions: Upload a bank statement from your computer
front.webcam: Position your bank statement in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

front.title: Credit Card Statement
front.sub_title: Must be issued in the last 3 months
front.instructions: Upload a credit card statement from your computer
front.webcam: Position your credit card statement in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

front.title: Utility Bill
front.sub_title: Must be issued in the last 3 months
front.instructions: Upload a utility bill from your computer
front.webcam: Position your utility bill in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

front.title: Benefits Letter
front.sub_title: Must be issued in the last 12 months
front.instructions: Upload a benefits letter from your computer
front.webcam: Position your benefits letter in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

front.title: Council Tax Letter
front.sub_title: Must be issued in the last 12 months
front.instructions: Upload a council tax letter from your computer
front.webcam: Position your council tax letter in the frame (it will be automatically detected)

face.title: Take a selfie
face.instructions: Upload a selfie from your computer
face.webcam: Position your face in the oval

liveness.press_record: Press record and follow the instructions

intro.title: Let’s make sure nobody’s impersonating you
intro.two_actions: We’ll ask you to film yourself performing <bolder>2 simple actions</bolder>

challenges.position_face: Position your face in the oval

driving_licence.message: Make sure your license details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

national_identity_card.message: Make sure your card details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

passport.message: Make sure your passport details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

bank_building_society_statement.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

credit_card_statement.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

utility_bill.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

benefit_letters.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

council_tax.message: Make sure details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

face.title: Check selfie
face.message: Make sure your selfie clearly shows your face

document.title: Take pictures on your mobile
document.take_photos: We’ll walk you through taking the ID photos

face.title: Take a selfie on your mobile
face.take_photos: We’ll walk you through taking your selfie

intro.sub_title: Continue verification on your mobile for best results. It’s easy, fast and secure.
intro.sms: We’ll SMS a secure link to your mobile (no app download required)
intro.take_photos: We’ll walk you through taking the ID photos
intro.return_computer: Return to your computer to complete your verification

client_success.title: Uploads successful
client_success.sub_title: You can now return to your computer to continue
client_success.body: Your computer may take a few seconds to update

link.title: Continue verification on your mobile
link.sub_title: We’ll text a one-time secure link to your mobile

submit.title: Great, that’s everything we need
submit.sub_title: We’re now ready to verify your identity

title.submessage: Once you've finished we'll take you to the next step

tips.item_1: Keep this window open while using your mobile
tips.item_2: Your mobile link will expire in one hour

mobile_notification_sent.title: Check your mobile
mobile_notification_sent.submessage: We’ve sent a secure link to %{number}
mobile_notification_sent.bold_message: It may take a few minutes to arrive

tips.item_1: Keep this window open while using your mobile
tips.item_2: Your mobile link will expire in one hour

switch_device.header: Need to use your mobile to take photos?
switch_device.submessage: Securely continue verification on your mobile

privacy.title: You'll have to upload a photo of your identity document
privacy.item_1: All your document details must be visible
privacy.item_2: Your document must be in colour
privacy.small_print: By continuing, you agree to the <terms>Onfido Terms of Use</terms> and understand that your information, including your facial identifiers, will be processed in accordance with the <privacy>Onfido Privacy Policy</privacy>

webcam_permissions.enable_webcam_for_selfie: Enable your camera to take a selfie with your device
webcam_permissions.click_allow: Click Allow on the popup that will appear on the next screen
webcam_permissions.why: Why do I need to do this?
webcam_permissions.if_denied: If you deny camera access, you won't be able to take pictures and complete the verification process.
webcam_permissions.recover_access: Recover camera access to take a selfie with your device
webcam_permissions.follow_steps: Follow these steps to recover camera access:
webcam_permissions.grant_access: Grant access to your camera from your browser settings
webcam_permissions.refresh_page: Refresh this page to restart the identity verification process

intro.title: Let’s verify your UK address
intro.matches_signup: Matches the address you used on signup

invalid_capture.instruction: Make sure all the document is in the photo

invalid_size.instruction: Size needs to be smaller than 10MB

no_face.instruction: Your face is needed in the selfie

multiple_faces.instruction: Only your face can be in the selfie

glare_detected.instruction: All details should be clear and readable

sms_failed.instruction: Copy the below link to your mobile instead

sms_overuse.instruction: Copy the below link to your mobile instead

lazy_loading.message: An error occurred while loading the component

invalid_number.message: Check your mobile number is correct

generic_client_error.instruction: You’ll need to restart your verification on your computer

camera_not_working.instruction: It may be disconnected or not functional. <uploadFallback>Try again.</uploadFallback>

liveness_timeout.message: Looks like you took too long
liveness_timeout.instruction: Remember to press stop when you're done
